attributes.action: re-instate nurse Margaret Haywood who was struck off by the Nursing and Midwifery Council for exposing the neglect of elderly patients at the Royal Sussex Hospital in Brighton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurse Margeret Haywood was struck off by the Nursing and Midwifery Council for exposing the neglect of elderly patients at the Royal Sussex Hospital in Brighton by secretly filming a documentary for the BBC.
Without whistle-blowers such as Margaret, standards within the NHS will continue to decline to third-world levels.
